frontmatter.title: How to Record Audio in the Browser

nodes.excerpt: There are three browser APIs we'll need for recording audio: MediaDevices MediaStream, and MediaRecorder. MediaDevices is for requesting access to a user's media inputs like cameras and microphones. MediaStream is for managing a stream of data, in our case from the user's input…
